lines:
Received 16

Answered 3 
ban Commonwealth Ave File Kwan

Boston, Mason March 6,1919.

My dear Dr. Steams,

am going to 
spend a week-end Swichte Mr. 
and Mrs. Lynde this week, 
and do hope to have iter 
pleasure is seeing you 
enter saturday wening 
standay. I

you will probably be 
meerested to know that eleven 
pars ago tus saturday was de 
first time I had een 
helenare to meet you at
raw: Received 16  Answered 3  ban Commonwealth Ave File Kwan  Boston, Mason March 6,1919.  My dear Dr. Steams,  am going to  spend a week-end Swichte Mr.  and Mrs. Lynde this week,  and do hope to have iter  pleasure is seeing you  enter saturday wening  standay. I  you will probably be  meerested to know that eleven  pars ago tus saturday was de  first time I had een  helenare to meet you at

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter about spending a weekend with Mr. and Mrs. Lynde and mentioning that it was eleven years ago that Kwan met Stearns At Dummer Academy (March 9, 1908), expressing the hope that they would again visit Dummer in a few days.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
